1.t: By the fig, by the olive,

3.t: and by this inviolable city, Mecca.

4.t: We have created the human being in the best form
4.tr: Laqad khalaqnal insaana fee ahsani taqweem

5.t: and We shall make him the lowest of low

6.t: except the righteously striving believers who will have a never ending reward.
6.tr: Ill-lal lazeena aamanoo Wa-'amilus saalihaati; falahum ajrun ghairu mamnoon

7.t: After (knowing) this, what makes you still disbelieve in the Day of Judgment?

8.t: Is God not the best of the Judges?
